reviews.text:
I recently had the pleasure of taking an signature eyelash extension basic + advanced course with the incredible Juju, and I couldn't be more impressed. From the moment I enrolled, the admin, Elliot, made everything seamless and welcoming.

Juju's dedication to her students is unmatched. Not only does she provide every single piece of equipment needed for the course, but she also goes above and beyond by supplying enough materials to give extra people a brand-new lash set. It's truly astounding!

What sets Juju apart is her unique offering of a free eyelash pod—the first of its kind in Singapore. This, coupled with her transparency and the fact that there are no hidden prices, makes her classes an absolute delight. Juju's expertise and genuine care for her students make her the best eyelash extension coach in Singapore.

Amazing class!!

I picked this place because of the topics that it covered so I would be able to be more well versed. It was exactly how I expected it to be and more. Other courses would teach u the basic thing, that's it. She covered all aspects.

They provided starter packages, which was incredibly useful for a beginner.

Teacher juju was patient, stern, and very experienced.

Totally recommended.

Got my lash lift and brow lamination certification here! The trainer, Juju, explained everything so well and even answered all our questions in detail. I had a 2:1 student to trainer ratio which was so engaging.
The admin, Elliot, assisted with all my questions very quickly and this made the whole experience very seamless.

I’d totally come again for other courses.

I recently completed the Jealash Lash Lift Course, and overall, it was a great learning experience. The course provided a comprehensive overview of lash lifting techniques, covering everything from client preparation and product application to aftercare and troubleshooting.

✔️ Well-Structured Content – The course was easy to follow, with step-by-step instructions and clear demonstrations. It was great for beginners and those looking to refine their skills.
✔️ Product Knowledge – The course included in-depth information about different solutions, timing, and how to customize lifts for different lash types.
✔️ Certification – A certificate of completion was provided, which is a nice bonus for anyone looking to offer this service professionally.

I’ve just completed my Lash & Brows course with Jealash and I couldn’t be happier! So grateful to have trained with Juju! Not only is she super knowledgeable, but also so easy to vibe with. She is really patient and supportive, keeping the whole experience fun and real. Highly recommend!
